wikipedia_page.main:
Arthur Henry Phebey (1 October 1924 – 28 June 1998) was an English cricketer. His entire first-class career was played for Kent County Cricket Club.
In a career spanning eighteen years, Phebey made 327 appearances for Kent as a right-handed batsman.
